title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon: A Detailed Breakdown of Today’s Combat Operations”

content.rendered:
Israel Defense Forces (IDF) spokesperson:

Launch site, terrorist cells and observation posts; IDF attacked targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanon.

Earlier today, combat aircraft attacked a launch site containing terrorists and observation posts of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in areas near Blida and Mis al-Jabal in southern Lebanon. In addition, an IDF tank attacked a terrorist cell in the area of Blida.

In response to alarms in the north of the country a short while ago, several launches were identified that crossed from Lebanese territory towards the state of Israel; the IDF attacked the sources of the fire.
